scene.name: Jigsaw puzzle setup
scene.description: A table with two matching jigsaw puzzle pieces scattered

task.name: Assemble and disassemble puzzle
task.description: Connect puzzle pieces together and then separate them back to the table
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will play with a puzzle. The goal is to connect the pieces and then take them apart.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要玩拼图。目标是将拼图碎片拼在一起，然后再拆开。

subtasks.description: Execute the assembly and disassembly sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please assemble the puzzle and then disassemble it.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请把拼图拼好，然后再拆开。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the pieces and fit them together securely.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起拼图碎片，把它们紧密地拼在一起。

steps.description: Separate the pieces and return them to original positions
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: separate the pieces and place them back on the table.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把拼图拆开，分别放回桌面原位。

constraints.notes: Ensure the pieces interlock correctly in step 1; place them flat on the table in step 2.
